text: I greet the moon. My wings emerge from my back; I soar to the top of my keep. I am untouchable. A gryphon lands next to me. We french.
Darkness falls.  I sit on my throne of bone and await the evening's offering.  My bat servant
column4: Theremiah
column5: returns to roost.

text: The eclipse has given me much power.  My skin glows.  Tonight I feast on large game.
